context: hello how are you today? May I ask if you have seen Deadpool 2 (2018) ?
Yes I have. It was such a great movie. More comedy than action though
What kind of movie are you in the mood for today?
I want a nice action movie
may I recommend some classics such as Die Hard (1988) and Predator
or how about Drive (2011) or The Transporter (2002)
Haven't seen Die Hard but heard it's good
resp: I would highly recommend Die Hard (1988)

I love movies that are thrilling, adventurous, and humorous all at the same time. Do you have any recommendations for me?

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy." It's a thrilling, adventurous, and humorous movie that you might enjoy!

context.feelings: I'm not sure if "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" will have enough thrilling action for me. I need something with more adrenaline-pumping scenes. The recommender is friendly and helpful, but I'm not fully convinced yet. I'll ask for more details about the movie.

context.content: "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" is a science fiction comedy that follows the adventures of an ordinary man who is swept off Earth just before it is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass. He embarks on a journey through space with an eclectic group of characters, encountering thrilling and adventurous situations along the way. The movie is filled with humor and unexpected twists, making it an entertaining and adventurous watch.

That sounds amazing! I'm really intrigued by the space adventure and the unexpected twists in "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy." It seems like it has all the elements I love in a movie. I'm definitely going to watch it. Thank you for the recommendation! [END]
entity: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
